body: can you share your code (the bit where you register)?

I am also have this issue with both 3.28.4 and 3.28.5. Downgrading to 3.27.0 fixes the issue.

The issue occurs for me only when the debugger is off. When in debug mode, all versions work fine.

Hope that helps.

Can you show me the code on how u register field?

@adhrinae i am going to update the doc. it's better to register during `useEffect()` but that's probably not the issue related, but worth to give it a try.
can you guys try out the latest version too?
going to close this issue as i have reverted unregister callback, which should fix this issue. i will reopen if you guys still find issues around it.
thanks @Dsantacruz for the screenshot, i think i need to see the render part and also not sure if the issue is from react-hook-form from the screenshot.

The issue is can't find variable `name`? I don't think that's issue of react-hook-form

`triggerValidation({ name, value: text });` where is the name?
